circleci = 'CIRCLECI' in os.environ
if circleci or not data_is_available:
    return
year = 2017
data = create_data_from_stata(create_dataframes=create_dataframes)
survey_scenario = SenegalSurveyScenario(data=data, year=year)
df_by_entity = survey_scenario.create_data_frame_by_entity(variables=['age',
    'salaire', 'impot_avant_reduction_famille', 'impot_revenus',
    'household_weight'])
for entity, df in df_by_entity.items():
    assert not df.empty, '{} dataframe is empty'.format(entity)
    log.debug(df)
pytest.mark.skip(reason=
    "FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/benjello/Dropbox/Projet_Micro_Sim/B_all_final_dta/TaxeIneq_prep_inc_SEN.dta'"
    )
